entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
